metadata.title: CVE-2021-27292 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ua-parser-js >= 0.7.14, fixed in 0.7.24, uses a regular expression which is vulnerable to denial of service. If an attacker sends a malicious User-Agent header, ua-parser-js will get stuck processing it for an extended period of time.

criterions.comment: node-ua-parser-js package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
